analysis.Summary: Vue single‐file component that renders a static SVG placeholder image (an icon shaped as a generic photograph).
analysis.Purpose: Acts as a reusable placeholder graphic for image containers or avatar slots when no real image is available.

Components.name: PlaceholderImage
Components.responsibility: Renders an inline SVG graphic using CSS variables for coloring.

analysis.Usage: Imported like any other Vue component: import PlaceholderImage from 'modules/icons/placeholders/PlaceholderImage.vue' and then used in templates as <PlaceholderImage/>.
analysis.Notes: 1. No <script> or <style> block—purely presentational.  2. Fill color is driven by the CSS variable `--main`.  3. Optimized for small bundle size and easy theming.
